devdoc.details: Contract for managing private documents metadata and ownership Integrates with AccessControl for permission management

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

getEntityType(address).details: Get entity type for an address

getPermissionDoc(uint256,address).details: Get permission details for a specific document-entity pair

getPermissionEntity(address).details: Get permission details for a specific patient-entity pair

grantAccessDoc(uint256,address,uint8,uin.details: Grant access to an entity for the patient's document record

params._entity: Address of the entity to grant access to
params._expiresAt: Timestamp when access expires (0 for no expiration)

grantAccessEntity(address,uint8,uint256,.details: Grant access to an entity for the patient's records

params._entity: Address of the entity to grant access to
params._expiresAt: Timestamp when access expires (0 for no expiration)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

registerEntity(uint8).details: Register an entity with its type

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._entity: Address of the entity to revoke access from
Address of the entity to revoke access from

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: DocsRecords

accessCreateDocument(address,bytes32,str.notice: Access Function to filter valid entities and inputs for creating a document

accessUpdateDocument(uint256,bytes32,str.notice: Access Function to filter valid entities and inputs for updating a document
